price: àwọn tí A kò dá irú wọn mọ́ sínú ìlú?
arabic: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: allatī lam yukh'laq mith'luhā fī al-bilādi
